markdown:
A voidglutton is a powerful type of [will-o'-wisp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=414) that haunts a site where misery dwells—such as a graveyard, prison camp, or recent battlefield. A voidglutton appears as a seething sphere of glowing eyes swirling around an empty black vortex 4 feet wide. From within this vortex extend long, semi-transparent tendrils that end in seven-fingered, needled hands. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 29 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 [Voidglutton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1041) **Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 87 **Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18 **Str** +0 **Dex** +6 **Con** +3 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +13 **Ref** +18 **Will** +16 **HP** 90 **Immunities** magic **Glow** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) 30 feet. The tips of a voidglutton's fingers and its seven eyes glow, casting bright light in the area and making it visible if it was [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26).
**Magic Immunity** A voidglutton is immune to all spells except faerie [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), magic missile, [_maze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), and spells with the [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) trait. --- **Speed** fly 40 feet **Melee** claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus 4d6 force and fearful strike **Ranged** ectoplasmic web +20 ([range increment 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** ectoplasmic web trap **Occult Innate Spells** DC 26 - **4th** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will) **Consume Light** ([Darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** The voidglutton casts [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59); **Effect** The voidglutton extinguishes its Glow as part of Casting the Spell. It becomes [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) as long as it remains in the area of _darkness_. If the voidglutton uses a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300), its invisibility ends as soon as the hostile action is completed. **Ectoplasmic Web Trap** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A creature hit by the voidglutton's ectoplasmic web trap is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and stuck to the nearest surface until it succeeds at a DC 26 check to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). Ectoplasmic Web Trap can immobilize [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures. **Fearful Strike** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) When the voidglutton damages a creature with its claw Strike, the creature must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure). **Feed on Fear** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per round; **Requirement** An enemy is affected by a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect or has the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) or [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition, and is within 25 feet of the voidglutton; **Effect** The voidglutton feeds on the creature's terror. It regains 3d4 Hit Points and its Glow reignites if it had been extinguished. It cannot use Consume Light again for 1d4 rounds, as it is too glutted on fear to suppress its Glow.
Agents of Empty Death As with [will-o'-wisps](/Monsters.aspx?ID=414) and their less powerful kin, [flickerwisp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1036), voidgluttons are associated with the Outer Goddess [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=163). Her cultists see voidgluttons as roving incarnations of her hunger and have been known to offer themselves up to voidgluttons as prey in order to achieve religious insights. Most who attempt this get a closer look at death than they intended.
name: Voidglutton

text: Voidglutton A voidglutton is a powerful type of will-o'-wisp that haunts a site where misery dwells—such as a graveyard, prison camp, or recent battlefield. A voidglutton appears as a seething sphere of glowing eyes swirling around an empty black vortex 4 feet wide. From within this vortex extend long, semi-transparent tendrils that end in seven-fingered, needled hands. Recall Knowledge - Aberration (Occultism): DC 29 Unspecific Lore : DC 27 Specific Lore : DC 24 Voidglutton Source Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight pg. 87 Perception +18; darkvision Languages Aklo, Common Skills Acrobatics +18, Deception +15, Intimidation +15, Occultism +18, Stealth +18 Str +0 Dex +6 Con +3 Int +6 Wis +4 Cha +3 --- AC 30 Fort +13 Ref +18 Will +16 HP 90 Immunities magic Glow (aura, light) 30 feet. The tips of a voidglutton's fingers and its seven eyes glow, casting bright light in the area and making it visible if it was invisible. Magic Immunity A voidglutton is immune to all spells except faerie fire, glitterdust , magic missile, maze , and spells with the light trait. --- Speed fly 40 feet Melee Single Action claw +20 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d6+2 piercing plus 4d6 force and fearful strike Ranged Single Action ectoplasmic web +20 (range increment 10 feet), Damage ectoplasmic web trap Occult Innate Spells DC 26 - 4th Darkness (at will) Consume Light Free Action (Darkness, Evocation, Occult) Trigger The voidglutton casts darkness ; Effect The voidglutton extinguishes its Glow as part of Casting the Spell. It becomes invisible as long as it remains in the area of darkness . If the voidglutton uses a hostile action, its invisibility ends as soon as the hostile action is completed. Ectoplasmic Web Trap (Conjuration, Occult) A creature hit by the voidglutton's ectoplasmic web trap is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it succeeds at a DC 26 check to Escape. Ectoplasmic Web Trap can immobilize incorporeal creatures. Fearful Strike (Emotion, Fear, Mental, Occult) When the voidglutton damages a creature with its claw Strike, the creature must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or become frightened 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure). Feed on Fear Single Action (Concentrate) Frequency once per round; Requirement An enemy is affected by a fear effect or has the frightened or dying condition, and is within 25 feet of the voidglutton; Effect The voidglutton feeds on the creature's terror. It regains 3d4 Hit Points and its Glow reignites if it had been extinguished. It cannot use Consume Light again for 1d4 rounds, as it is too glutted on fear to suppress its Glow. Agents of Empty Death As with will-o'-wisps and their less powerful kin, flickerwisp, voidgluttons are associated with the Outer Goddess Nhimbaloth. Her cultists see voidgluttons as roving incarnations of her hunger and have been known to offer themselves up to voidgluttons as prey in order to achieve religious insights. Most who attempt this get a closer look at death than they intended.
